title: Formula for Centripetal Acceleration
text: The formula for centripetal acceleration is $$a_c={\omega}^2 r$$

title: Calculate the Centripetal Acceleration
text: First remember to convert the unit of ω from $$\frac{rev}{min}$$ to $$\frac{rad}{s}$$: $$\frac{rad}{s}=\frac{2\frac{rev}{min} \pi}{60}$$. Then plug into values to calculate $$a_c$$.
